name: Easy Forum Tool (EFT)

screenshots.caption: User Group Functions for adding and viewing Friends.

short_description: Software to manage BBS, Admin controle, morderator Controle, And even a BBS server listing for BBS browsing. Full controle for all BBS system! The EFT will be able to do admin function, moderator function and also be used for daily forum users.
